region.read can delete their own activit.name: region.read can delete their own activities
region.read can delete their own activit.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              public.users u
            WHERE
              u.id = user_fk
              AND u.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))

region.read can update their own ascents.name: region.read can update their own ascents
region.read can update their own ascents.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              public.users u
            WHERE
              u.id = created_by
              AND u.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))
region.read can update their own ascents.withCheck:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              public.users u
            WHERE
              u.id = created_by
              AND u.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))

region.read can update bunny_streams for.name: region.read can update bunny_streams for files of their own ascents
region.read can update bunny_streams for.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              public.files f
              JOIN public.ascents a ON f.ascent_fk = a.id
              JOIN public.users u ON a.created_by = u.id
            WHERE
              f.id = file_fk
              AND u.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))
region.read can update bunny_streams for.withCheck:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              public.files f
              JOIN public.ascents a ON f.ascent_fk = a.id
              JOIN public.users u ON a.created_by = u.id
            WHERE
              f.id = file_fk
              AND u.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))

            WHERE

          ) AND EXISTS (SELECT authorize_in_region('region.read', region_fk))

users can read regions they are members.name: users can read regions they are members of
users can read regions they are members.using:
EXISTS (
            SELECT
              1
            FROM
              region_members as rm
            WHERE
              rm.region_fk = regions.id
              AND rm.auth_user_fk = (SELECT auth.uid())
              AND rm.is_active = true
          )
